snippet: JACOBS--Samuel JACOBS--Dr. Bertrand FINEMAN--Joseph Miss you and love you more than ever. Carol won a Tony! Frances Jacobs Fineman 1/3
lead_paragraph: JACOBS--Samuel JACOBS--Dr. Bertrand FINEMAN--Joseph Miss you and love you more than ever. Carol won a Tony! Frances Jacobs Fineman 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  JACOBS, SAMUEL JACOBS, DR
